DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effectiveness behavioral treatment , drug treatment , combine treatment child Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder ( ADHD ) . This study also examine interaction different level behavioral drug treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Behavioral Treatment , Drug Treatment , Combined Treatment Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder ( ADHD )
DOC.detailed_description: Participants attend summer treatment program Monday-Friday 9 week . They participate group recreational classroom activity , 12 child 5 staff per group . Three behavioral condition ( behavioral modification , low-intensity behavioral modification , high-intensity behavioral modification ) deliver random order , condition last 3 week . Along behavioral treatment condition , child receive 1 4 medication dos ( placebo , 0.15 mg/kg methylphenidate , 0.3 mg/kg methylphenidate , 0.6 mg/kg methylphenidate ) random order , dose varied daily repeat 3 4 time within behavioral treatment condition . Measures include frequency count positive negative behavior , academic productivity accuracy classroom , counselor , parent , teacher rating benefit side effect . Parents attend train session implement behavioral program home .
